skill.name: writing-plans
skill.description: Use when you have a spec or requirements for a multi-step task, before touching code
skill.summary: Use when you have a spec or requirements for a multi-step task, before touching code
skill.author: Cycleaddict

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill with no executable code. Contains only markdown documentation for writing implementation plans. No file access, network calls, or command execution capabilities.

content.value_statement: Developers struggle to break down complex features into clear, executable tasks. This skill generates comprehensive implementation plans with exact file paths, test code, and step-by-step instructions following TDD principles.
actual_capabilities: Generates step-by-step implementation plans from specs
Provides exact file paths and commit commands
Enforces DRY, YAGNI, and frequent commit practices
Offers subagent-driven or parallel session execution
limitations: Requires brainstorming skill context to run effectively
Does not write or execute any code itself
Cannot access codebase without explicit file paths
Only generates plans, does not implement features

use_cases.title: Rapid feature rollout
use_cases.description: Ship complex features faster with clear task breakdowns that reduce context switching

use_cases.title: Cross-team coordination
use_cases.description: Create consistent implementation documentation that works across different skill levels

use_cases.title: Structured coding sessions
use_cases.description: Break down overwhelming features into 2-5 minute tasks for focused development

prompt_templates.title: New endpoint feature
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a plan for adding a login endpoint with JWT tokens to our API

prompt_templates.title: Database schema change
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a plan to add a user_preferences table with foreign key to users

prompt_templates.title: UI component
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a dashboard widget that displays user activity charts using our existing chart library

prompt_templates.title: API integration
prompt_templates.prompt: Integrate Stripe payment processing across checkout, subscription, and invoice services

output_examples.input: Write a plan for adding user profile photos to our app
output: Task 1: Create database migration for avatar_url column
Task 2: Write API endpoint to upload images
Task 3: Add frontend file upload component
Task 4: Connect UI to API endpoint

best_practices: Break tasks into 2-5 minute chunks for focused work
Provide complete code snippets in plans, not vague instructions
Share all relevant context including existing patterns and style preferences
anti_patterns: Creating vague tasks like 'implement feature' without specifics
Skipping test-first development in the generated plan
Missing file paths or using relative paths instead of exact paths

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for plan generation and execution.

faq.question: How detailed are the generated plans?
faq.answer: Plans include exact file paths, complete code snippets, test cases, and specific git commands.

faq.question: Can I use this with other skills?
faq.answer: Yes, designed to work with brainstorming, executing-plans, and subagent-driven-development skills.

faq.question: Is my codebase data safe?
faq.answer: This skill only reads your input and generates text. No files are written or accessed directly.

faq.question: What if plans are too detailed?
faq.answer: You can ask for higher-level summaries or fewer tasks. Adjust granularity based on your needs.

faq.question: How is this different from just asking Claude?
faq.answer: Enforces consistent structure, TDD approach, and provides execution handoff options automatically.
